snippet: In a report published late on Thursday, Institutional Shareholder Services backed virtually every argument that Elliott has made for its five director nominees since beginning its fight earlier this year.
abstract: In a report published late on Thursday, Institutional Shareholder Services backed virtually every argument that Elliott has made for its five director nominees since beginning its fight earlier this year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: I.S.S. Backs Elliott in Fight Over Hess's Board
